title: Loot store looks like it's been reset

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: My loot store seems to have been reset and not a clue how it happened. Last night I had a few shards in there, along with plenty of essence and chests, and I woke up to this (through link).

replies.body: Restart the client, this could be a visual bug.
Yeah, thanks. It took about half hour, but it was all back to normal afterwards. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
